borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.5pt;margin-left:0cm"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">The
proposed development, by reason of its mass, bulk and unsympathetic roof form
will appear as an incongruous addition and would have an enclosing effect
closing the gap between the two terraces. The&nbsp;</span>proposal&nbsp;would
negatively impact on the character and appearance of the dwellinghouse and the
wider area.&nbsp; As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<u1:p></u1:p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><o:p></o:p></span></p><ul><li style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Paragraphs 126,&nbsp;130 and
134 of the&nbsp;National Planning Policy Framework National Planning Policy
Framework&nbsp; (DLUHC, July 2021);</span><u1:p></u1:p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Policies&nbsp;D1 and D4 of
the London Plan (March 2021);</span><u1:p></u1:p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Policy CP3 of the London
Borough of Barking and Dagenham Core Strategy (July 2010);</span><u1:p></u1:p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Policy BP11 of the London
Borough of Barking and Dagenham Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD
(March 2011);</span><u1:p></u1:p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Policies SP 2, DMD 1 and DMD
6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham Draft London Plan (Regulation
19);</span></li><li style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Sections 5.4.1 and 5.4.2 of
The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document
(February 2012).</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><o:p></o:p></span></li></ul>
description: Construction of a first floor side extension
